trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown in <see cref="M:System.Type.FindMembers(System.Reflection.MemberTypes,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.MemberFilter,System.Object)" /> when the filter criteria is not valid for the type of filter you are using.
trans-unit.target: 當篩選準則對於您所使用的篩選器型別無效時，在 <see cref="M:System.Type.FindMembers(System.Reflection.MemberTypes,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.MemberFilter,System.Object)" /> 中擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: `InvalidFilterCriteriaException` uses the HRESULT COR_E_INVALIDFILTERCRITERIA which has the value 0x80131601.
trans-unit.target: `InvalidFilterCriteriaException` 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_INVALIDFILTERCRITERIA 0x80131601 的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see langword="InvalidFilterCriteriaException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see langword="InvalidFilterCriteriaException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.InvalidFilterCriteriaException" /> class with the default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.InvalidFilterCriteriaException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an instance of `InvalidFilterCriteriaException` with an empty message string and the root cause exception set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化的執行個體`InvalidFilterCriteriaException`具有空的訊息字串和根會造成例外狀況設`null`。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the `Exception` object as follows:
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定的屬性`Exception`物件，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: null
trans-unit.target: null

trans-unit.source: The empty string ("").
The message text for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況的訊息文字。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.InvalidFilterCriteriaException" /> class with the given HRESULT and message string.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 HRESULT 和訊息字串，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.InvalidFilterCriteriaException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Reflection.InvalidFilterCriteriaException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Reflection.InvalidFilterCriteriaException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="SerializationInfo" /> object that contains the information required to serialize this instance.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="SerializationInfo" /> 物件，包含要序列化這個執行個體的必要資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="StreamingContext" /> object that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="StreamingContext" /> 物件，包含與這個執行個體相關聯的已序列化資料流的來源和目的端。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.InvalidFilterCriteriaException" /> class with the specified serialization and context information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的序列化 (Serialization) 和內容資訊，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.InvalidFilterCriteriaException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外狀況的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.InvalidFilterCriteriaException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.InvalidFilterCriteriaException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Reflection.InvalidFilterCriteriaException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Reflection.InvalidFilterCriteriaException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。
